sentences.sContent: Fred and Jeff are friends. They want to take a trip together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fred and Jeff are friends. They want to take a trip together.
sentences.sCn: 国庆节快要来临了，弗雷德和杰夫是朋友，他们想一起去旅行。

sentences.sContent: Because of this, we often feel the need to take a trip somewhere to “get away from it all” as they also say.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of this, we often feel the need to take a trip somewhere to “get away from it all” as they also say.
sentences.sCn: 为此，我们常常感到有必要去什么地方旅行来摆脱这种生活， 但是与其花大把的钱外出乱逛，为什么不稍作停歇？
